input: Batch request to get lifecycle status and renewal status for contracts with UUIDs 22334455-6677-8899-aabb-ccddeeff0011 and 44556677-8899-aabb-ccdd-eeff11223344.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContracts/22334455-6677-8899-aabb-ccddeeff0011?$select=PaymentCardLifeCycleStatusName,PaymentCardRenewalStatusName HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContracts/44556677-8899-aabb-ccdd-eeff11223344?$select=PaymentCardLifeCycleStatusName,PaymentCardRenewalStatusName HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator--
